mapper.select: SELECT AVG(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(entered_dt) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP(waiting_dt)) FROM waiting_log WHERE waiting_dt >= DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{monthDto.year}, '-', #{monthDto.month}, '-01'), '%Y-%m-01') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{monthDto.year}, '-', #{monthDto.month}, '-01'), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH)

SELECT AVG(waiting_party_size) FROM waiting_log WHERE waiting_dt BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{monthDto.year}, '-', #{monthDto.month}, '-01'), '%Y-%m-01') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{monthDto.year}, '-', #{monthDto.month}, '-01'), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH);
SELECT HOUR(waiting_dt) AS hour, COUNT(*) AS count FROM waiting_log WHERE DATE(waiting_dt) = #{now} GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour
SELECT HOUR(waiting_dt) AS hour, COUNT(*) AS count FROM waiting_log WHERE waiting_dt BETWEEN #{weekDto.firstDay} AND #{weekDto.lastDay} GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour

SELECT HOUR(waiting_dt) AS hour, COUNT(*) AS count FROM waiting_log WHERE waiting_dt BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{monthDto.year}, '-', #{monthDto.month}, '-01'), '%Y-%m-01') AND DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(CONCAT(#{monthDto.year}, '-', #{monthDto.month}, '-01'), '%Y-%m-01'), INTERVAL 1 MONTH) GROUP BY hour ORDER BY hour;
